items.sentence: The family received discouraging news from the doctor about Tom's health.
If you see Tom today, please tell him that he's invited to my party, too.
I saw the old gentleman cross the street and enter a store on the corner.
I was really disappointed when I found out that I hadn't passed the exam.
Life is short, so don't waste your time doing things that you don't like.
I didn't get to the bank before it closed because I was stuck in traffic.
Tom was already halfway to his car when Mary shouted at him to come back.
A bucket list is a list of things that people want to do before they die.
I never got the chance to practice French much until I started traveling.
I wanted to buy the book, but I found I had no more than 200 yen with me.
